sentences.sContent: Cord held the reins while the stallion tugged and snorted.
sentences.sCn: 当那匹牡马使劲挣扎，打着响鼻的时候，科德勒紧了缰绳。

sentences.sContent: ...This case gives the court an opportunity to rein in the growing use of patents to protect genetically engineered crops and other life forms-but the court may well use it to give this trend a powerful new endorsement...
...They are also hoping the court's ruling will rein in patent law...

phrases.pCn: 政权(常与动词 assume 或 drop 连用)

remMethod.val: 与其堕落(ruin)下去， 不如悬崖勒马(rein)

trans.tranOther: a long narrow band of leather that is fastened around a horse’s head in order to control it

trans.tranCn: 勒缰使停步； 控制， 约束
